posts.author: Volkaryn
posts.content:
Hi!

I would like a PvP build for a Halfling Rogue on Arelith. Something with high AC and sneak attacks. I like dagger(s), but other weapon(s) would be fine.

posts.author: Rua Blackmist
posts.content:
Well for starters least the way I see it. You might want to start out as a Rogue.
Dex 17
14 Con
10 Str
Rest dump into Int

Since going rogue you might want to pick the Dex, Con gifts.
For skills (these are really up to you, however I recommend) Max hide, Move silent, Tumble, UMD, Search, Disarm trap, open lock, you can pick the last few if you want (Set trap is invaluable in PvP so long as you can control the targets.) I recommend picking up Heal, as well though you will likely be using potions of heal for help. Another option is Spot, or listen.
Feats should be point blank shot, weapon finesse, Rapid shot. At least those three (assuming you're willing to use a bow)

You'll be able to get off sneak attacks, from a safe distance, whilst also able to lead them into some deadly traps (assuming you take Set trap)

I might can make a level by level play by play if you want. But, ....I'm normally just helpful with starting it up :3. Though, this is also my first time. Might wanna more experienced hand.

posts.author: Volkaryn
posts.content: Hey, thanks for helping. I don't know about the feats for bows, mostly wanna focus in up close and personal sneak attacks - may use a bow sometimes though, for the sneak attacks. And the level by level would be nice. Who else in the audience likes stabbies?
